title: "We have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends now we will try to...
body:
patch it to the latest version.."
So got this new problem today. New client, tried to login. This message appeared, than I logged in. In the client I couldn't click on the "Play" button. But in some cases I could, than I started a game. After the picks I couldn't connect to the game. Reconnect didn't work, neither the restarted client couldn't fix this problem. (No possibility to connect to the game.) Sorry for my bad english, looking for someone to fix this problem.
Update: Initiated a full repair in the new client but afterwards the problem still exists. (Still can't click the "Play" button.)

replies.body: the message I keep getting is the casual: "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."

Did you check your local network settings? This message typically indicates that there are issues with your connection reaching our game servers. I'd strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are configured properly.

Let me know if this fixed the issue.

The only way I have managed to fix my problem was that I opened (in the game folder) the lol.launcher.admin, which downloaded some data, than worked properly. The launcher icon is the old one, but when I click launch in it, it comes to the new log-in screen and to the new client (new pick and ban, store etc.)

I'm glad to hear you got it working by launching from the admin shortcut! If you want to access the *Legacy Client*, you can simply click the button to access it (for now):

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Thank you!
But I like the new client and the effort you guys put into it!
Keep up this morale!
Cheers!

My question is this:

NA server was down so I switched to Oceania.  Then I got this old "restored this installation" message again, which I solved last time by redownloading and reinstalling the whole darned game.

In the past, the legacy client worked.  Now that there's no legacy client, I cannot run the game.

I do not want to keep reinstalling it.

And by the way this is NOT NOT NOT a connectivity issue.  I was playing fine on NA today on the new client, I was playing fine before on the legacy client in all regions.

It's the new client.  Yes, it bloody is.  Don't tell me to start doing tracert, replacing my router etc. etc. because every other game and program still works normally.

ALSO: launching the admin client gave me brief hope, but then it spawned the new client, which still did not have the "Play" button available.

> 
> ALSO: launching the admin client gave me brief hope, but then it spawned the new client, which still did not have the "Play" button available.

I was experiencing the same issue and i think i found a possible fix (at least it worked on my part) i went into the league_client folder (Riot Game> League of Legends > RADS > Projects > league_client > releases) i saw that there is 2 folders 0.0.0.69 and 0.0.0.70 i assume the issue is when u launch the client it runs the league client inside 0.0.0.69 >deploy folder which is an older version in this case and when i ran the league client in 0.0.0.70 > deploy folder it scans some files (takes few min) then no restored to older installation message appeared and afterward i logged in and play button works
Thanks, even though im late but this helped me! Thx!
Worked for me! Thanks for this ^.^

If we  know what causes this and that it happens under a set of unavoidable conditions that occur on a daily cycle, can we disable this "feature".

When i click the Lol Icon and go to the login screen... it shows "we have restored this installation to an older version of League Of legends. now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version' and i cant do anything and if i try to exit and join again it shows it over and over. Some help me pls{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
